name: Gyarados
flavorText:
Once it begins to rampage, a
GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.

previous.name: Magikarp

weak descendants

next.flavorText:

has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.
